name: RecallGraph
description: A versioning data store for time-variant graph data
author: Aditya Mukhopadhyay

snapshot-intervals.description: The interval (number of command hops) between two consecutive snapshots. This can be specified per-collection, apart from a default fallback.

trace-sampling-rate.description: The probability of propagating a trace sample. Can be overriden by header param.

dd-agent-url.description: The Datadog agent URL where to publish finished spans
